FuncDef: The display ipv6-pool max-ratio domain command displays information about IPv6 address pool or prefix pool usage in all domains on the device.
Examples: NDRA Unshared Prefix                Current       Used                 Time
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After an IPv6 address pool is bound to a domain, IPv6 addresses or prefixes in the address pool are assigned to users in the domain for login and released upon user logout. To check IPv6 address pool or prefix pool usage in all domains and determine whether bound IPv6 address pools need to be adjusted, run the display ipv6-pool max-ratio domain command to check the current and historical maximum IPv6 address pool or prefix pool usage.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
